MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 and LL34 areas of Conwy and Penmaenmawr affecting properties in Sychnant Pass Road, Fairy Glen Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 6:50pm. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required and conditions on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:07am on 28th March 2021.
